alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 5:49AM EST until January 03 at 8:20PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 548 AM EST, the automated gauge at Macksburg on Duck Creek was at 13.9 feet and rising. Between 13 feet and 15 feet, Broad Street starts to flood near the creek, homes on the left bank start to flood and the campground next to the gauge floods. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Macksburg and Lower Salem.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
